# Reptilian
[color=#008000]Reptilians are enabled for character creation.[/color]
[color=#66bbff]Reptilians can be achieved via the metem machine.[/color]
Reptilians are a very large species of humanoid looking lizards.
## Ability Differences
- Take more cold damage. - Take slightly less heat damage. - Slightly less slash damage. - Slightly more blunt damage.
## Physical Differences
- Have tons of various markings. - Have no hair. - Have a different voice (scream/laugh). - Can have any color of skin.
